name: hook0
description: Hook0 is a self hosted webhook service that centralizes outbound webhooks for your applications. It offers event routing, retries and history, along with a clear web UI and API for managing subscriber endpoints securely.

features.title: Webhook Support
features.description: Centralize all outbound webhooks from your applications in one service

features.title: Event Routing
features.description: Route events to multiple subscriber endpoints based on event types

features.title: Automatic Retries
features.description: Retry failed webhook deliveries with exponential backoff

features.title: Delivery History
features.description: Track all webhook attempts with timestamps and response codes

features.title: REST API
features.description: Add, remove, and configure subscriber endpoints through web UI or API

features.title: Payload Transformation
features.description: Transform event payloads before delivery to subscribers

features.title: Security Features
features.description: Sign webhooks with HMAC signatures for verification

features.title: Rate Limiting
features.description: Control delivery rates to prevent overwhelming subscriber endpoints
